inclusion.criterion: 18 to 75 years of age at Visit 1
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Male and female subjects with symptomatic PAH (Group I Dana Point Updated Clinical Classification 2008)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects on stable pretreatment with sildenafil at a dose of 20 mg
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Subject's participating in another clinical trial or who have done so within 30 days before Visit 1
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe dyspneic symptomology preventing outpatient living, but is on stable pretreatment with sildenafil at a dose of 20 mg.
